title: (mt) hosting: any advice?
content:
Hello Typophiles,   
   
I'm planning to sign up for a webhosting account at media temple. Does anybody recommend their service? Is it really good? I'm tired of amateur webhosting providers...   
   
Best regards,   
Hugo
author: hugocristo

comments.content: I just know that they are hosting ( and sponsoring ) some rather big portals, design platforms and fellow designers.. And it seems like these people trust in them and their hosting.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051124102959im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

_And, I am still waiting for Typophile to finally offer web hosting.. Nah.. Sorry.. Just kidding.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051124102959im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_
